trans-unit.source: Provides methods for converting expressions to strings.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于将表达式转换为字符串的方法。

trans-unit.source: Authors of expression activities who want to offer a short textual form of the activities' expressions should implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: 想要提供活动表达式的简短文本形式的表达式活动作者应实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the expression can be converted into a string.
trans-unit.target: 确定表达式是否可以转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用于转换的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression can be converted into a string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以将表达式转换为一个字符串;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts an expression to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将表达式转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Context information that is used for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 用于转换的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 表达式的字符串表示形式。
